pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantitative Linkage Analysis Tools using the Variance Components Approach // Calculate the polygenic and major gene models for quantitative trait linkage analysis using variance components approach. The 0.2.2 release includes bug fixes that allow 'multic' to run properly on 64-bit systems. The 0.3.0 release includes a fully implemented sw2mloci() function. As of 0.3.8, Splus version is no longer supported. Additional documentation and examples can be found in the inst directory.
